Traveling with lift pass: Not valid between Mezzaselva and Kublis. Traveling with guest card:  Not valid between Mezzaselva and Kublis;  unless staying in Saas and guest card is marked with an S. In which case not valid for travel between Saas and Kublis. Through connection to Landquart is weekdays only and not availbe on public holidays.
